item.title: A Prettier Word Cloud
item.description: Word cloud is one of the most common visualizations we see today, especially with social media analytics. Open source libraries like D3JS have eased developers life. With these libraries we can quickly wire data and get beautiful visualizations. Thanks to Mike Bostock for giving the community d3.js and http://bl.ocks.org. With bl.ocks, we have a plethora of visualizations from the community, open to public with their implementation. This library from Jason Davies — https://github.

item.title: Markers with D3
item.description: Every time I look at the examples page of D3, I’m simply go… @mbostock has transformed how visualizations are created for web. Today I learnt how to use svg markers with D3. I was using force layout to analyze graphs, just like this example. But I wanted a directed graph! Later, I came across another example which had direction. I was happy because a ready-made solution solved the problem. But soon I ran into problem as I wanted a custom tree like structure with every path being directed i.
